section_name.projectsSubtitle: These are some of the projects I made
section_name.skillssubtitle: These are the main technologies I master
section_name.languagesubtitle: These are the languages I have proficiency
section_name.contactsubtitle: Click on the buttons to contact me :)
section_name.experiencesubtitle: Get to know more about me checking some of the events that impacted most on my academic and professional career.

projects.title: SPAM Classifier
projects.description: A small SPAM classifier I made using Logistic Regression. The classifier is within an object class and can be imported and used. With exception of the regression, imported from SKLearn, the classifier algorithm was made from scratch. Click the button next to the name to see more.

projects.title: Proffy
projects.description: A full-stack application I made during NextLevel2 event by RocketSeat. The project consists in a full application focused on register of teachers so that new students can find and reach out to them. The project has a back-end structure for data processing, and a front-end app mobile and website. Click the button next to the name to see more.

projects.title: Moodle's Cluster Analysis
projects.description: During my Scientific Research at University of SÃ£o Paulo, I made an Exploratory Data Analysis with data from the university's Moodle, the main educational platform in the university. In this analysis, I made a cluter analysis using k-means, seeking to find different groups of student's profiles, and to get insights about those profiles. Click the button next to the name to see the analysis.

experience.title: Data Scientist
experience.text: At my first full-time job, I work giving technical support to the sales team about the company's Data Science solution, and building teaching material about it. I also build, test and deploy pilot-projects with algorithms made in Scala.

experience.title: Graduated in Physics
experience.text: After 4 years in college, I graduated in Physics at USP, with a licentiate degree.

experience.title: Business Intelligence Analyst
experience.text: Again in the private sector, I had an internship at Omni Brasil, where I worked mainly gathering insights for the sales and marketing team, building databases from scratch using PostgreSQL, building data visualizations with Google Data Studio, and manipulation data with Python.

experience.title: Scientific Research Intern
experience.text: Adding one more Scientific Research, I studied here about the history and epistemology of the electromagnetism of the end of the XIX century at England. More specifically, I studied the episthemological difference between the Physics and Engineering of this time and place.

experience.title: Scientific Research Intern
experience.text: Within the university's scientific research internship program, I worked with Moodle, the university's educational platform. I worked mainly with the platform's content administration and building a website from scract using WordPress technology.

experience.title: Begin of the Physics graduation
experience.text: Taking a break in the private sector so I could focus on my studies, I began the Physics graduation at University of SÃ£o Paulo.

experience.title: Logistics Assistant
experience.text: At my first job, still as an intern and then as a official employee, I worked administrating the operational and functional aspects of the company's logistics.
